sn42.11:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā mallesu viharati uruvelakappaṃ nāma mallānaṃ nigamo.
sn42.11:4.2: Atha kho bhadrako gāmaṇi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn42.11:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho bhadrako gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.11:4.5: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā dukkhassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desetū”ti.
sn42.11:4.6: “Ahañce te, gāmaṇi, atītamaddhānaṃ ārabbha dukkhassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca deseyyaṃ:
sn42.11:4.7: ‘evaṃ ahosi atītamaddhānan’ti, tatra te siyā kaṅkhā, siyā vimati.
sn42.11:4.8: Ahañce te, gāmaṇi, anāgatamaddhānaṃ ārabbha dukkhassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca deseyyaṃ:
sn42.11:4.9: ‘evaṃ bhavissati anāgatamaddhānan’ti, tatrāpi te siyā kaṅkhā, siyā vimati.
sn42.11:4.10: Api cāhaṃ, gāmaṇi, idheva nisinno ettheva te nisinnassa dukkhassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmi.
sn42.11:4.13: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho bhadrako gāmaṇi bhagavato paccassosi.
sn42.11:5.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, atthi te uruvelakappe manussā yesaṃ te vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn42.11:5.2: “Atthi me, bhante, uruvelakappe manussā yesaṃ me vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti.
sn42.11:5.3: “Atthi pana te, gāmaṇi, uruvelakappe manussā yesaṃ te vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā nuppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn42.11:5.4: “Atthi me, bhante, uruvelakappe manussā yesaṃ me vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā nuppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti.
sn42.11:5.5: “Ko nu kho, gāmaṇi, hetu, ko paccayo yena te ekaccānaṃ uruvelakappiyānaṃ manussānaṃ vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn42.11:5.6: “Yesaṃ me, bhante, uruvelakappiyānaṃ manussānaṃ vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā, atthi me tesu chandarāgo.
sn42.11:5.7: Yesaṃ pana, bhante, uruvelakappiyānaṃ manussānaṃ vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā nuppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā, natthi me tesu chandarāgo”ti.
sn42.11:5.8: “Iminā tvaṃ, gāmaṇi, dhammena diṭṭhena viditena akālikena pattena pariyogāḷhena atītānāgate nayaṃ nehi:
sn42.11:5.9: ‘yaṃ kho kiñci atītamaddhānaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppajji sabbaṃ taṃ chandamūlakaṃ chandanidānaṃ.
sn42.11:5.11: Yampi hi kiñci anāgatamaddhānaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppajjissati, sabbaṃ taṃ chandamūlakaṃ chandanidānaṃ.
sn42.11:5.14: Yāva subhāsitañcidaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā:
sn42.11:5.15: ‘<span class=\"var\" title=\" \" id=\"note496\">yaṃ kiñci dukkhaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, sabbaṃ taṃ chandamūlakaṃ chandanidānaṃ.
sn42.11:5.17: Atthi me, bhante, ciravāsī nāma kumāro bahi āvasathe paṭivasati.
sn42.11:5.18: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, kālasseva vuṭṭhāya purisaṃ uyyojemi:
sn42.11:5.20: Yāvakīvañca, bhante, so puriso nāgacchati, tassa me hoteva aññathattaṃ:
sn42.11:5.21: ‘mā heva ciravāsissa kumārassa kiñci ābādhayitthā’”ti.
sn42.11:6.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, ciravāsissa kumārassa vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn42.11:6.2: “Ciravāsissa me, bhante, kumārassa vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me nuppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti.
sn42.11:6.4: ‘yaṃ kiñci dukkhaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, sabbaṃ taṃ chandamūlakaṃ chandanidānaṃ.
sn42.11:7.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, yadā te ciravāsimātā adiṭṭhā ahosi, assutā ahosi, te ciravāsimātuyā chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn42.11:7.3: “Dassanaṃ vā te, gāmaṇi, āgamma savanaṃ vā evaṃ te ahosi:
sn42.11:7.4: ‘ciravāsimātuyā chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā’”ti?
sn42.11:8.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, ciravāsimātuyā te vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn42.11:8.2: “Ciravāsimātuyā me, bhante, vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me nuppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti.
sn42.11:8.4: ‘yaṃ kiñci dukkhaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, sabbaṃ taṃ chandamūlakaṃ chandanidānaṃ.
